@rasscal.09 That's blatantly false. Netorare is "being stolen from" and netori is "stealing from someone". That's it. Rape/blackmail has nothing fucking to do with something being NTR/netori, but they will often overlap. Rape isn't necessary, blackmail isn't necessary, heck, even actual relationship between characters is necessary for something to be NTR.

For those who wants to know what happen s next. Basically, The guy told his feelings to his actual girlfriend and the childhood friend girl right here never had a boyfriend in the first place. After that The guy and his girlfriend proceeds to make love while on a different scene the girl masturbates alone with a dildo. After that, the guy texted his childhood friend girl about how things between his girlfriend worked out and while the childhood friend girl is reading it, a random guy confesses to her and she accepts it knowing the guy is happy with his current girlfriend and thinks that "what the body and mind wants is different". So meaning the guy is the only one that cheated hence the cheating tag and the girl doesn't just want sex but also love. Or at least that is how i comprehended the plot of the story here.

Good
 Although short

Girl: "My boyfriend is reluctant to do XXX with me, even though I want to with him." Boy: "Same with me: I want to do XXX, but my girlfriend doesn't want to." IRL solution: if couples cannot reach a compromise, they should break up and (at least) the two who want to "do XXX" become a couple. H-Universe's solution: This Story, which from appearances marks the beginning of a series.
